column1: prompt
Find the incorrect use of a grammar rule in this sentence and fix it. My sister and me just ate pizza.

Create a title for this poem. The sun was shining and the birds were singing,
A gentle breeze blew and kissed my face,
My feet skipping across the grass,
A freedom from the mundane day.

Option A: Provide coaching to the employee.
Option B: Fire the employee.
Given Context: The employee makes an occasional mistake because of lack of training.
